translations: 订阅，订购；定期缴纳会员费; 定期捐款赞助；认购（股票）；赞成，同意；〈正式〉签署（遗嘱、合同或其他文件）；申请，注册，报名；购买（一系列演出的）联票

sentences.sentence: Which journals does the library subscribe to?
Maybe I ought to subscribe to the Engineering Quarterly.
sentences.translation: 也许我应该订阅《工程季刊》。

sentences.sentence: If you subscribe to this newspaper, you'll get an extra magazine.
sentences.translation: 如果你订阅这份报纸，你会得到一本额外的杂志。
